Text:
hey man,
i saw that you love Stevie Salas. check the post i put at the RARE Stevie torrent i just started downloading (tho I buy his records - just wanted the live extra)

you got any live Stevie ?

anyway, here's the comment i posted, in case you don't see it:


y'all REALLY should grab this:

http://www.dimeadozen.org/torrents-details.php?id=295515

it's :

The I.M.F.s (Stevie Salas, Bernard Fowler, Dave Abbruzzese, TM Stevens) Limelight Cologne Pro Shot DVD

Rockpalast live show from 2010

PLEASE share any live stuff, especially from the Alter Native tour, which i saw in Tokyo

thanks

Thanks for the heads up on the Stevie! I don't have any live material, but I do have a couple of Fowler releases AND the entire catalog of Stevie. I am working on a big Stevie torrent I hope to have up soon!
Hey I wrote that Amazon comment! Sweet. Thanks for using it.
